about_the_game:
This game requires a controller.

We are in the middle of the ocean.

Forbidden Escape is a 3rd person puzzle-solving and combat game that mixes supernatural clashes and platforming, on a tanker kept secret from the rest of the world, where scientists experiment on child guinea pigs to harness the supernatural effects of an artifact found at the bottom of the sea. 

After nearly a decade of research, something goes wrong and the artifact explodes, spreading an encroaching corruption throughout the entire ship and infecting all of its passengers.

You play as Riley, a young guinea pig who seems to be the only one to have survived the infection. Escape the tanker and discover the new powers that lie dormant within you.

Explore the various levels of Exodus in linear levels and follow Riley's interesting encounter with Inspeca, the Alien Artifact, as she attempts to escape the only home she has ever known.

Characteristics

  • Embark on this supernatural adventure - escape from a secret ship, sinking in the middle of the ocean, while fending off any danger that crosses your path.

  • Platforming - test your agility through perilous paths that will put your skills to the test.

  • Puzzle solving - exercise your brain with challenging and interesting puzzles that force you to use all the resources at your disposal.

  • Brutal Combat - unlock new supernatural abilities to aid you in battles against humans now transformed by the corruption of the artifact.

  • Atmosphere and touching narration - the loneliness seems heavy in this sinking ship as the artifact quietly takes possession of what was once your only home. Find your changed friends and try to free them from this unprecedented infection.

This original product was entirely developed by nearly thirty students of the 2021-2022 cohort of the Campus ADN, a public videogame school in downtown Montreal, as part of a 15-week end-of-study production project under the supervision of around ten industry professionals.

content_descriptors.notes: This game talks about young children being abused by scientists. The player will be fighting against teenagers and blood will be visible throughout the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 TI 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A controller is recommended

short_description: Escape the Exodus, a ship attacked by an encroaching corruption, and embark on a supernatural adventure to explore the various levels of the vessel. Try to survive against dangers and find the solution to challenging puzzles.
